name: 100 Balls- Tap to Drop
description:
Hundred Balls Physics is on of the most addictive mobile game. What are you waiting for? Play this incredible addicting game and test your reflexes.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Open the lids with your tap and fill the passing cups with a variety of balls to reach higher scores! Be wary though, the longer you manage to keep up, the harder and faster it gets!

- If you manage to drop 25 balls through the cup without missing a single one, you will be rewarded with a score multiplier. Keep in mind that the multiplier is not limited and can earn you a lot of extra points.

FEATURES:

- Single tap control;
- Leaderboard;
• Sounds and music.
- Solid and fun physics!
- Simple yet enjoyable gameplay, just a single tap!
- Realistic Physics
- Endless Gameplay
- Addicting game
- Clean graphics
